title: Asklepieion of Messene
description: The Asklepieion in Ancient Messene is a sanctuary of Asklepios, the Greek god of healing, constructed in 214 BC. The complex includes civic as well as sacred buildings

properties.description: The Asklepieion in Ancient Messene is a sanctuary of Asklepios, Greek god of healing, constructed in 214 BC; the complex includes civic as well as religious buildings
properties.title: Asklepieion of Messene
